__e: Mrs. Wesley, it's important for you to stay calm, okay?
You have Wesley, and you treat him like he's stupid, but he isn't.
And Toby said, um he said that he might have already met a girl that was his other chance and that, "maybe Wesley is your other chance."
Wesley, you wouldn't be in my life if you were the only man left on the planet.
And since Wesley hasn't changed his clothes since last night...
Still, I think I'd be able to handle all of this if my boyfriend, Wesley, hadn't just broken up with me.
